00025 
00026 
00027 // static protected inline methods
00028 
00029 inline double CSplineSegmentFunction::GetValueKernelAt(double alpha)
00030 {
00031        return (2 * alpha - 3) * alpha * alpha + 1;
00032 }
00033 
00034 
00035 inline double CSplineSegmentFunction::GetDerivativeKernelAt(double alpha)
00036 {
00037        double beta = 1 - alpha;
00038        return alpha * beta * beta;
00039 }
